作者原文：
Exodus from Paradise- A billoxiiboy build -Showcasing some of the very best ofMinecraft's GeniusCustom Tree & Item Creators....the follow up build to Island Beneath the Mist
Exodus from Paradise
An untold Paradise awaits the Adventurous Explorer enteringThe Great Dwarven East Gate.Forests of Giant Trees tower above the mystical gardens beneath.Waterfalls ribbon the mountain gullies, creating spectacular crystal clear pools, drapedwith floral vines; cascading ever downwards.Ride them like a Fantasy Water Slide!See Amazing Statues and a commanding Central Templeradiating the inner serenity of the world.Discover hidden Ancients dwelling in the shadows.Dip into the soothing waters and bathe in the dappled heavenly light.Battle the raider incursion of the north wall and help the Wasp Army defend the land.Or will you take flight with the convoy of escaping Hot air Balloons and lead the dash to**?Discover the Mechanical Mansion, paused with indecision on the southern shore.Or, take the journey along the Great Wall that surrounds the entire world.There is so much to do and play with in this incredible map.Full of Wonderful and spectacular Custom items.Enjoy a world created by fellow PMC Artists and share in their imagination!All this and so much more awaits you in Exodus from Paradise.... 

译文：
-由billoxiiboy建造-建筑淋漓尽致的展示了一些Minecraft的美自定义的树和Item Creators.在  Island Beneath the Mist中继续建造。
—极乐岛—
是一个鲜为人知的美妙境地等待着冒险者的到来。东方的矮人门。参天大树耸立在神秘的公园。波澜壮阔的瀑布环绕在山沟中，如同水晶般清澈的池塘，挂着层层叠叠的藤蔓。像梦幻的水滑梯乘驾着他们。
在这欣赏令人惊叹的雕像和令人瞩目的圣殿。流露着内心世界的宁静。发现隐藏在黑暗中的古人。“扑咚”，在水中舒适的水中，沐浴极乐岛的光芒。
与入侵的掠夺者对抗，帮助他们保卫领土。或者，乘坐逃离热气球的车队，带头冲刺！**？
探索机械公馆，在南岸中停留。或者，来一个环球旅行。
在这张令人难以置信的地图中，你有很多事可以做和玩耍。充满了精彩壮观的Custom items.享受由PMC艺术家创造的世界和他们的想象力吧！
极乐岛的一切都在等待着你——NGK3译自原文
